languages.text: {n}Слуга гемункула с воем начинает колотить себя громадным кулаком по черной маске. Из-под нее доносится сдавленный вой, похожий на рыдание. Затем кулак разжимается, и смягченный, почти человеческий голос произносит:{/n} "Ваша Светлость..."

{n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга гемункула с воем начинает колотить себя громадным кулаком по черной маске. Из-под нее доносится сдавленный вой, похожий на рыдание. Затем кулак разжимается, и смягченный, почти человеческий голос произносит:{/n} "Ваша Светлость..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked whimpering is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches, and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n}" Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの従者が吠え、その巨大な拳で黒い仮面を殴り始める。咽び泣くような叫び声が内側から聞こえる。そして、巨大な手がゆるみ、はるかに柔らかく、まるで人間に戻ったかのような声で呼びかける。{/n}「陛下…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの従者が吠え、その巨大な拳で黒い仮面を殴り始める。咽び泣くような叫び声が内側から聞こえる。そして、巨大な手がゆるみ、はるかに柔らかく、まるで人間に戻ったかのような声で呼びかける。{/n}「陛下…」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}血伶人的仆人突然开始嚎叫起来，开始用巨大的拳头猛击黑色的面具，面具里面传来了一声哽咽的嚎叫。随后，怪物松开了那只大手，以几乎像是人类的柔和声音喊了起来。{/n}“大人……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人的仆人突然开始嚎叫起来，开始用巨大的拳头猛击黑色的面具，面具里面传来了一声哽咽的嚎叫。随后，怪物松开了那只大手，以几乎像是人类的柔和声音喊了起来。{/n}“大人……”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}El sirviente del Hemónculo aúlla y comienza a golpear la máscara negra con su gigantesco puño. Puedes oír un rugido ahogado, como un sollozo. Después, abre su enorme mano y, con una voz mucho más suave, casi humana, dice:{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente del Hemónculo aúlla y comienza a golpear la máscara negra con su gigantesco puño. Puedes oír un rugido ahogado, como un sollozo. Después, abre su enorme mano y, con una voz mucho más suave, casi humana, dice:{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Der Diener des Haemonculus heult und beginnt, mit seiner riesigen Fast gegen die schwarze Maske zu schlagen. Ein ersticktes Geheul ertönt aus dem Inneren, fast ein Schluchzen. Dann öffnet sich die riesige Hand und eine viel weichere, fast menschliche Stimme ruft:{/n}" Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Diener des Haemonculus heult und beginnt, mit seiner riesigen Fast gegen die schwarze Maske zu schlagen. Ein ersticktes Geheul ertönt aus dem Inneren, fast ein Schluchzen. Dann öffnet sich die riesige Hand und eine viel weichere, fast menschliche Stimme ruft:{/n}" Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur de l'hémoncule pousse un long hurlement entrecoupé de sanglotements et se met à marteler son masque de son énorme poing. Quand enfin, il abaisse sa main, une voix presque humaine vous interpelle :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur de l'hémoncule pousse un long hurlement entrecoupé de sanglotements et se met à marteler son masque de son énorme poing. Quand enfin, il abaisse sa main, une voix presque humaine vous interpelle :{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârı, uluyarak devasa elleriyle siyah maskeyi yumruklamaya başlıyor. İçeriden ağlamayı andıran, kısık bir uluma duyuluyor. Ardından kocaman elini açarak çok daha yumuşak, neredeyse insanı andıran bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus's servant howls and starts punching the black mask with its massive fist. A choked sob-like howl is heard from the inside. Then the huge hand unclenches and a much softer, almost human voice calls out:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..."
